clinical_history: Patient presents with cough and fever.
findings: Bronchiectatic changes in right upper lobe region.
Patchy ground-glass opacities noted in right upper lobe.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in right upper lobe.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of right upper lobe.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in right upper lobe.
recommendations: Immediate intervention may be required depending on severity.
